prompts: Create a fiery horse Pokemon with a flowing mane that resembles flames.
I want a majestic Pokemon that gallops through fields with a vibrant coat of colors.
Generate a Pokemon that embodies speed and grace, with a fiery personality.
Make a Pokemon that looks like a horse but has magical fire abilities.
Imagine a Pokemon with a stunning mane that glows like embers in the night.
Design a swift fire-type Pokemon that roams the grasslands with elegance.
Show me a Pokemon that combines the beauty of a horse with the essence of fire.
